row.process:
:SET &CTV_MAX_PAKETE# = GET_VAR(VARA.CTV.PARAMETER,"ALLGEMEIN_CTV_MAX_PAKETE",3)
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.CTV.NV_UNIT) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &UNIT# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &AKTIV# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &AKTIV# = "J" or "Y" : SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.CTV.NV_DRUKZ) : PROCESS &HND2# : SET &DRUKZ# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,1) : SET &AKTIV# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#,2) : IF &AKTIV# = "J" or "Y" : IF &DRUKZ# = "B" or "S" : SET &COUNT# = &CTV_MAX_PAKETE# : WHILE "&COUNT#" <> "0" : SET &NUM# = FORMAT(&COUNT#,"00") : PRINT "Starte Paket &UNIT#&DRUKZ#&NUM#" : PSET &PA# = "&UNIT#&DRUKZ#&NUM#" : SET &ALIAS# = "&PA#" : SET &RUN_OBJECT# = "JOBP.CTV.NV_SUB1" : INC JOBI.RUN_OBJECT_PASS_VALUES_ALIAS : SET &COUNT# = SUB(&COUNT#,1) : ENDWHILE : ELSE : PRINT "Starte Paket &UNIT#&DRUKZ#" : PSET &PA# = "&UNIT#&DRUKZ#" : SET &ALIAS# = "&PA#" : SET &RUN_OBJECT# = "JOBP.CTV.NV_SUB1" : INC JOBI.RUN_OBJECT_PASS_VALUES_ALIAS : ENDIF : ELSE : PRINT "Druckkennzeichen &DRUKZ# nicht aktiv!" : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND2# : ELSE : PRINT "Unit &UNIT# nicht aktiv!" : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
